Background:
Alberto Esses is a Mexican Industrial designer based in Los Angeles, California. He's passionate about creating products that help define the way we live, work, travel and communicate - from furniture pieces to consumer electronics and forward-thinking transportation experiences. He's currently a full-time designer for Tesla's studio team.
